protein.specific_function: Has low NADPH-dependent oxidoreductase activity towards 4-benzoylpyridine and menadione (in vitro).

pathway.name: Metabolism of xenobiotics by cytochrome P450

reference.reference_text: Watanabe K, Sugawara C, Ono A, Fukuzumi Y, Itakura S, Yamazaki M, Tashiro H, Osoegawa K, Soeda E, Nomura T: Mapping of a novel human carbonyl reductase, CBR3, and ribosomal pseudogenes to human chromosome 21q22.2. Genomics. 1998 Aug 15;52(1):95-100.
